title: The Hart Family Series Box Set
description: For the first time ever the complete Hart Family Series is together in box set form.  Broken Hart  What happens when the man who vowed never to fall in love meets a woman that he can't be without?  Shattered Hart  He's a player, she's a virgin. What could possibly go wrong?  Loving Hart  Spencer and Delilah were made for each other. There's just one little problem...  Unbroken Hart  Loving Sabrina healed Dante's Broken Hart, but he'll never forget what it took to get there.  Missing Hart  No matter the reason for it, a lie can ruin everything. When an unexpected twist brings these soulmates back together, things get hot.  Finding Hart Two couples separated by circumstances beyond their control. One family hell bent on finding their girls. It's all come down to this.  **The Hart Family series is HOT. These couples are passionate & sexual. If sexy stories aren't your thing, these books aren't for you.**
author: Ella Fox
